sentences.sContent: The meeting ended with a pledge to step up cooperation between the six states of the region.
sentences.sCn: 会议以加快该地区6个州之间合作的承诺结束。

sentences.sContent: ...The bills would lock that pledge into law...
...a remedy to the current fashion for pledge signing...

synos.tran: 保证，誓言；[经]抵押；抵押品，典当物
保证，许诺；用……抵押；举杯祝……健康

words.tran: 接受抵押或人；接受保证者
立誓人；抵押者，典当者；举杯祝酒的人

trans.tranOther: a serious promise or agree-ment, especially one made publicly or officially
to make a formal, usually public, promise that you will do something
